pull.title: Trivial: pass Consensus::Params& instead of CChainParams& in ContextualCheckBlock
pull.body:
Pre-witness my plan was to get rid of ContextualCheckBlock and move its check to ConnectBlock/Consensus::VerifyTx, so this was not necessary.

This should be the last existing consensus function that needs to get Consensus::Params instead of ChainParams or call Params() from inside.

events.message: Trivial: pass Consensus::Params& instead of CChainParams& in ContextualCheckBlock

events.body: Sorry, contained an old TODO that wasn't true. Updated. Ping @NicolasDorier @dcousens
